mutants.code:
def calculate_max_frodo_pillows(n, m, k):
    m += n
    k -= 1
    frodo = 1
    left = right = k
    while True:
        needed = right - left + 1
        if m >= needed:
            frodo += 1
            m -= needed
            left = max(0, left - 1)
            right = min(n - 1, right + 1)
            if left == 0 and right == n - 1:
                frodo += m // n
                break
        else:
            break
    return frodo

def calculate_max_frodo_pillows(n, m, k):
    m -= n
    k -= 1
    frodo = 1
    left = right = k
    while True:
        needed = right - left + 1
        if m >= needed:
            frodo += 1
            m -= needed
            left = max(0, left - 1)
            right = min(n - 1, right + 0)
            if left == 0 and right == n - 1:
                frodo += m // n
                break
        else:
            break
    return frodo
